TextLibrary.Text: Brian of Bartonia
You fought well for a novice. You show much promise in the art of war.
You fought well for a novice. You show much promise in the art of war.

Thank you, Sir. I try my best.
Thank you, Sir. I try my best.
Thank you, Sir. I try my best.
Thank you, Sir. I try my best.
When your training is complete, I hope you will return to join the Bartonian Order.
When your training is complete, I hope you will return to join the Bartonian Order.

When your training is complete, I hope you will return to join the Bartonian Order.
What more can you tell me about the Bartonian Order?
What more can you tell me about the Bartonian Order?
What more can you tell me about the Bartonian Order?
What more can you tell me about the Bartonian Order?

We are the largest order of Knights in Agaria. Our warriors are the finest because we hold regular tourneys to test our skill. We are also the most strict of the orders. Chivalry is our way of life, and we tolerate no deviance from this path.

Thank you. When my training is done, you may see me again!
